pageContext._xxxcollectionTitlextxt: Tommy Boy records, "Soul On The Dial"
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Project covered a range of DJ's on ethnic/black/soul/funk/urban stations, 1950's - late 90's. Most of the DJ's are African-American, but a surprising few are not. Almost all markets in the US are covered.
pageContext._xxxcollectionNotesxtxt: All the material is in WAV form, either transferred from 2 track reel to reel or from cassette. Some need a bit of cleaning up in terms of tape hiss/radio interference, but most are in very good condition.
